title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 point(s) maximum

Short-term: Caffeine does not affect short-term memory/memory at 10 minutes.

Long-term: Caffeine improves/increases the long-term memory/memory at 24 hours.
descriptions:
Student response earns 0 of the following 2 points

2 point(s) maximum

Short-term: Caffeine does not affect short-term memory/memory at 10 minutes.

Long-term: Caffeine improves/increases the long-term memory/memory at 24 hours.

Student response earns 1 of the following 2 points

2 point(s) maximum

Short-term: Caffeine does not affect short-term memory/memory at 10 minutes.

Long-term: Caffeine improves/increases the long-term memory/memory at 24 hours.

Student response earns 2 of the following 2 points

2 point(s) maximum

Short-term: Caffeine does not affect short-term memory/memory at 10 minutes.

Long-term: Caffeine improves/increases the long-term memory/memory at 24 hours.
